item.title: Azure WAF Tuning for Web Applications
item.description: Azure Web Application Firewall provides a comprehensive solution for protecting web applications from various types of application attacks, ensuring high availability and optimal performance. It is critical to configure WAF in such a way as to reduce the likelihood of false positives while still providing sufficient protection against actual threats. False positives occur when a Web Application Firewall (WAF) erroneously detects legitimate web traffic as malicious and subsequently denies access.
